SELECT employee_number,SUM(money) wage FROM work_order
AND create_at >= STR_TO_DATE(#{qstartTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND create_at <= STR_TO_DATE(#{qendTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and deleted = 0
GROUP BY employee_number

SELECT t1.product_uuid, t2.totalNumber, SUM( t1.money ) totalMoney FROM work_order t1, ( SELECT product_uuid, SUM( t.number ) totalNumber FROM ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT product_uuid ) AS product_uuid, GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT depart_uuid ) AS depart_uuid, GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT number ) AS number FROM work_order
AND create_at >= STR_TO_DATE(#{qstartTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND create_at <= STR_TO_DATE(#{qendTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and deleted = 0
GROUP BY product_uuid, depart_uuid, number ) t GROUP BY product_uuid ) t2
t1.product_uuid = t2.product_uuid
AND t1.create_at >= STR_TO_DATE(#{qstartTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND t1.create_at <= STR_TO_DATE(#{qendTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and t1.deleted = 0
GROUP BY t1.product_uuid
